Comments :
A sheriff (Thornton) begins an investigation into the death of a local 
transsexual after hearing that high ranking politicians may have been 
involved. Although he is homophobic, his investigation causes him to be 
rejected by others, forcing him to seek help from the people he once despised.

Director : Robby Henson

Writer: Robby Henson
